src:
Milošević: Igrači moraju da pokažu reakciju protiv Vojvodine
01 Nov 2019, 16:05 by Zile
Derbi meč 15. kola Linglong Superlige Srbije između Partizana i Vojvodine biće odigran u subotu od 14 časova, a Savo Milošević je izneo svoja očekivanja pred ovaj duel.
Milošević je najpre demantovao da nije želeo da napusti klub posle poraza od Čukaričkog.
– Nije tačno da sam želeo da odem. Tačno je da sam bio ljut. Nisam se pojavio na konferenciji za novinare i to je moja greška, dugujem izvinjenje svim medijima. Nemam opravdanja osim…vremenom se skupljaju razne stvari i to je bila moja reakcija koja nije bila primerena i apsolutno nemam opravdanja. Ako možete opraštajte, ako ne sudite, rekao je Milošević, a prenela Beta.
Milošević je potom pokušao da objasni razloge loših rezultata u šampionatu u poslednje vreme.
– Jedan od naših zaključaka je broj igrača sa kojim igramo sva takmičenja nije dovoljan da bismo igrali na istom novou i u domaćoj ligi i u Evropi. I ovo govorim kao činjenicu, ne kao opravdanje. To nas nikako ne opravdava. Moguće je i da su igrači bili prepotentni posle pohvala za igre u Evropi, ima više faktora. Ovo je osnovni i realan da postoji ogromna fizička potrošnja i ne može se nadoknaditi, to je delom razumljivo, ali ima i nešto što se zove psihološki aspekt. Psihološki umor može da se prevaziđe voljnim momentom i može da se prevaziđe i fizički umor pravim pristupom i voljnim momentom. To je nešto što meni smeta, ne samo u ovoj poslednjoj utakmici, pogotovo posle velike potrošnje koju imamo u Evropi.
Vojvodina je nezgodan rival za Partizan.
– I da smo dobili Čukarički, ista bi priča bila, očekuje nas teška utakmica, još jedan derbi, rival koji je nezgodan po nas, pogotovo u ovoj situaciji u kojoj smo. Nije samo pitanje jedne utakmice nego niz utakmica, a psihološki momenat nije najbolji. Moja ideja je bila da malo prodrmamo situaciju obzirom na raspored koji nas čeka, ali ljudi neće razumeti opravdanja. Moramo da nađemo snagu da prevaziđemo ove stvari. Istina, posle imamo relativno lakši raspored u prvenstvu ali treba doći do toga i preživeti. Sutra će morati da bude reakcija, a da li će biti dovoljno za rezultat…Rekao sam više puta da fudbal nije egzaktna nauka, ali reakcije će morati da bude, jasan je trener Partizana.
Ekipe koje predvodi Nenad Lalatović igraju prepoznatljiv fudbal.
– Mislim da nije promenio svoju filozofiju, on je na igri jedan na jedan po celom terenu, nekom totalnom fudbalu i dalje insistira i neke nosioce igre vuče sa sobom kad god je to moguće. Njegove ekipe su jako nezgodne da im parirate, Vojvodina posle Partizana i Zvezde ima najskuplji tim, mnogo individualno jakih igrača, ali mislim da je snaga u ekipi i u posebnom pristupu koji ima Lalatović. Na energiju i trku Vojvodine moramo da odgovorimo ako želimo dobar rezultat, zaključio je trener Partizana.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Milosevic: Players must show their reaction against Vojvodina
01 Nov 2019, 15:05 by Zile
The 15th round of the Linglong Super League of Serbia Derby match between Partizan and Vojvodina will be played on Saturday from 2 pm, with Savo Milosevic voicing his expectations ahead of this duel.
Milosevic first denied that he did not want to leave the club after his defeat to Cukaricki.
- It's not true that I wanted to leave. It is true that I was angry. I did not appear at a press conference and that is my fault, I owe an apology to all the media. I have no excuse except ... over time, various things collect and it was my reaction that was not appropriate and I have absolutely no excuse. If you can forgive, if you don't judge, said Milosevic, Beta uploaded.
Milosevic then tried to explain the reasons for the poor results in the championship recently.
- One of our conclusions is that the number of players we play with is not enough to play on the same rookie in the domestic league and in Europe. And I say this as a fact, not as a justification. That justifies us in no way. It is also possible that players were sweaty after praising the games in Europe, there are several factors. This is basic and realistic that there is a huge amount of physical consumption and it cannot be compensated, it is partly understandable, but there is also something called the psychological aspect. Psychological fatigue can be overcome by willing momentum and physical fatigue can be overcome with the right approach and willing momentum. This is something that bothers me, not only in this last game, especially after the heavy consumption we have in Europe.
Vojvodina is a tricky rival for Partizan.
- And if we got Cukaricki, the same story would be, we expect a tough match, another derby, a rival that is inconvenient for us, especially in this situation we are in. It's not just a matter of one game but a series of matches, and the psychological moment is not the best. My idea was to shake things up a bit given the schedule ahead, but people would not understand the justifications. We need to find the strength to overcome these things. True, we have a relatively easier championship schedule afterwards, but we need to get there and survive. Tomorrow will have to be a reaction, and will it be enough for a result ... I have said repeatedly that football is not an exact science, but reactions will have to be, the coach of Partizan is clear.
Teams led by Nenad Lalatovic play recognizable football.
- I don't think he has changed his philosophy, he is on a one-on-one play all over the pitch, some total football still insists and he drags some game-makers with him whenever possible. His teams are very inconvenient to parry them, Vojvodina after Partizan and Zvezda has the most expensive team, many individually strong players, but I think the strength is in the team and in the special approach that Lalatovic has. We must respond to the energy and race of Vojvodina if we want a good result, concluded Partizan coach.
